sentences.sentence: A radioisotope power source will provide heat and electric power to the rover.
sentences.translation: 而放射性同位素能量源可以为探测器提供热量和电能。

sentences.sentence: Solar panels will supply power and radioisotope heater units will help it withstand the extreme cold on Mars.
sentences.translation: 太阳能电池板将提供电力，而放射性同位素加热器单元能够经受火星的严寒气候。

sentences.sentence: Taking stable iodine as a pill blocks the uptake of the hazardous radioisotope, which has a half-life of 8 days.
sentences.translation: 服用稳定的碘元素会阻止危险碘同位素的摄入，碘同位素的半衰期仅为八天。
